removedRowsDescription: View rows from your home page you’ve chosen to hide or add rows back to your home page.
emptyMessageRemovedRows: When you remove rows from your home page, they will show up here. You can add them back at any time.
emptyMessageHiddenContent: When you hide recommended content from your home page, they will show up here. You can add them back at any time.
emptyMessageFollowing: You aren’t following anything. Select a series to follow and you’ll receive notifications anytime a new episode or season is released.
followingDescription: Follow original series, hosts, teachers and topics to customize recommendations.
hiddenContentDescription: Hide content from your recommendations by clicking the on your home page.
